HRM_Main module¶

HRM_Main.HRM_Main(direcLocation='data/', interval=[0, 0])¶

Function that takes in EKG .csv files, collects useful information, and turns them into .json files.

Parameters:
  • direcLocation – string that provides path to folder with .csv files
  • interval – list(float) of length two detailing the interval of interest. Default is entire length of EKG
Raises:
  • ImportError – Error raised when packages missing
  • TypeError – Error raised when inputs are of incorrect type
  • ValueError – Error raised when values are inappropriate for the function.
HRM_Main.collect_csv(path)¶
HRM_Main.createHRM_Class(name, time, volt, interval)¶
HRM_Main.createJSON(hrm_info)¶
HRM_Main.datacleaner(df)¶
